channel.title: Delta (When you logout and relog u be in home place)
channel.description:
Hello Im Using DeltaScape Source
Ill Give a example for understainding it
suppose u make lvl 3 account and u trained him till any level and you logout in varrock next day or next hour u wanted to play again when u login u see ur self in falador (old home area) but u dont lose ur stats u just get teleported there after u logout so evertime u logout and login u be in that dumb home
how i can make it so if u logout in varrock u stay in varrock PLEASE HELP I NEED THAT ALOT!
Thanks,.

item.title: Delta (When you logout and relog u be in home place)
item.dc:creator: @xpatx xpatx
item.description:
@xpatx wrote:

I assume it would be in the initialize() method because thatâ€™s on start up when you log in.

Read full topic

item.title: Delta (When you logout and relog u be in home place)
item.dc:creator: @manmanner manmanner
item.description:
@manmanner wrote:

if you find the coord for where in fally you log in
you can search for it in the logout or login method
and remove the code that warps to fally

Read full topic

item.title: Delta (When you logout and relog u be in home place)
item.dc:creator: @manmanner manmanner
item.description:
@manmanner wrote:

get the coords for the place you are at when you log in
and search in client.java for toX = xcoordhere;

Read full topic
